detail_desc: Sleeveless romper suit in slub cotton jersey with press-studs down the front, raw-edge patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Three-piece suit set with a jacket, T-shirt and pair of trousers. Jacket and trousers in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend. Jacket with lapels, buttons at the front, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. T-shirt in cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder and a contrasting colour chest pocket.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with an imitation leather appliqué on one sleeve and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with an imitation leather appliqué on one sleeve and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with an imitation leather appliqué on one sleeve and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted top in soft ribbed fabric with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a straight-cut hem.
Fitted top in soft ribbed fabric with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a straight-cut hem.
Shorts in washed, organic cotton denim with an elasticated waist, fly with decorative buttons, and side pockets.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Sleeveless, pleated blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a raw-edge hem.

Backpack in canvas and imitation leather with a padded laptop sleeve inside. Handle at the top and padded, adjustable shoulder straps. Drawstring closure at the top and a flap with a concealed press-stud. Concealed outer compartment in the flap and two outer compartments with a flap and concealed press-stud at the front. Padded back plate. Lined. Size 18x28x42 cm.
Leggings in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and small bow at the front. Overlocked, crinkled edges at the hems.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Cap in washed, patterned cotton twill with an adjustable buckle at the back.

Suit trousers woven in a viscose blend with an extended waistband with a concealed button and a zip fly with a button and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.

This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow shoulder straps and deep armholes. Integral, lined sports bra with shoulder straps and an elastic hem.
Shirt in a soft weave with a grandad collar, decorative chest pocket with a button and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.

Body in crêpe jersey with a U-shaped decoration at the top, a detachable strap at the back of the neck, concealed silicone trim at the top and press-studs at the crotch.

Jumper in a fine-knit Tencel™ lyocell blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester and cotton content of the jumper are recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
